TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TypeValidationEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 控件执行可选类型验证时发生此事件。The event occurs when a control performs optional type validation. 仅当 属性不为， `null` 并且发生因果操作（如失去焦点的控件）时，才会发生类型验证 。Type validation occurs only when the property is not `null` and a causal action occurs, such as the control losing focus. *类型验证* 是将格式化输入字符串转换为属性表示的类型的能力 。*Type validation* is the ability to convert the formatted input string to the type represented by the property. 有关类型验证过程的详细信息，请参阅 事件。For more information about the type validation process, see the event. 如果为实现了事件处理程序 ，则处理程序将接收类型为的参数 。If an event handler is implemented for , the handler receives a parameter of type . 此参数包含有关事件的信息，例如类型转换过程是否成功、验证类型等。This parameter contains information about the event, such as whether the type conversion process succeeded, the validating type, and so on. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `MaskedTextBox1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `MaskedTextBox1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#488](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#488)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#488](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#488)]

summary.span: 获取或设置指示是否应取消事件的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the event should be canceled.

value.span: 如果事件应取消，并且 控件应保留焦点，则为 ；否则为 ，以继续验证过程。

span.span: if the event should be canceled and focus retained by the control; otherwise, to continue validation processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件恰好在事件之前发生 。The event occurs just before the event. `true` 如果在事件处理程序中将属性设置为，则 将取消该事件，使 控件保持焦点，除非随后的 事件将其属性的版本设置 为 `false` 。Setting the property to `true` in the event handler will cancel the event, causing the control to retain focus, unless the subsequent event sets its version of the property to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `MaskedTextBox1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `MaskedTextBox1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#488](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#488)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#488](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#488)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示格式化输入字符串是否成功转换为验证类型。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the formatted input string was successfully converted to the validating type.

value.span: 如果格式化输入字符串可以转换为 属性所指定的类型，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the formatted input string can be converted into the type specified by the property; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示 `Parse` 在 由属性表示的中找到的方法是否成功 。The property indicates the success of the `Parse` method found in the represented by the property. 此类型必须包含 `Parse` 方法 (s，) 具有以下一个或两个签名：This type must contain `Parse` method(s) having one or both of the following signatures: `public static Object Parse(string)` `public static Object Parse(string, IFormatProvider)` `Parse` 在 控件引发事件前调用 。`Parse` is called before the control raises the event. 调用此方法时，将包含类的属性的内容，而不是提示字符 。This method is invoked with the contents, minus the prompt characters, of the property of the class. 如果成功，则返回转换后的对象;否则，它将返回 `null` 。If successful, it returns the converted object; otherwise, it returns `null`. 有关类型验证过程的详细信息，请参阅 事件。For more information about the type validation process, see the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `MaskedTextBox1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `MaskedTextBox1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#488](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#488)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#488](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#488)]

summary.span: 获取描述转换过程的文本消息。

A containing a description of the conversion process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证过程需要将格式化的用户输入转换为属性定义的类型 。The validation process entails converting the formatted user input to the type defined by the property. 属性包含转换过程的文本说明。The property contains a text description of the conversion process. 当转换失败时，主要非常有用，如 属性值所示 `false` 。 is primarily useful when conversion fails, as indicated by an property value of `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `MaskedTextBox1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `MaskedTextBox1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#488](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#488)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#488](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#488)]

summary.span: 获取格式化输入字符串转换所生成的对象。

span.span: Gets the object that results from the conversion of the formatted input string.

value.span: 如果验证成功，则为 ，表示转换后的类型；否则为 。

span.span: If the validation is successful, an that represents the converted type; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类型验证过程尝试将格式化输入字符串（不包括提示字符）转换为属性指定的类型 。The type validation process attempts to convert the formatted input string, not including prompt characters, to the type specified by the property. 属性表示转换尝试的结果，它等效于类的方法返回的值 。The property represents the result of the conversion attempt, and is equivalent to the value returned by the method of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `MaskedTextBox1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `MaskedTextBox1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#488](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#488)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#488](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#488)]

summary.span: 获取格式化输入字符串的验证目标类型。

span.span: Gets the type that the formatted input string is being validated against.
The target of the conversion process.

value.span: 任何情况下，该值都不应是 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 类的属性不为时，才会执行验证过程 `null` 。The validation process only occurs if property of the class is not `null`. 属性引用同一类型，该类型表示转换过程的目标类型。The property references the same type, which represents the target type of the conversion process. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `MaskedTextBox1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `MaskedTextBox1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#488](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#488)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#488](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#488)]
